10:35 <VincentMassol[m]> ah nice feature too: https://forum.xwiki.org/t/new-members-saying-hello/50/4  
10:35 <VincentMassol[m]> users can withdraw posts and we have 24 hours to decide if we want to keep it or not  
10:35 <tmortagne[m]> wrong chat ?  
10:35 <VincentMassol[m]> nope :)  
10:35 <VincentMassol[m]> I meant it here  
10:35 <VincentMassol[m]> it's on our discourse  
10:36 <VincentMassol[m]> I just discovered this feature and wanted to share it  
10:36 <VincentMassol[m]> ahhhh  
10:36 <VincentMassol[m]> grrrrr  
10:36 <VincentMassol[m]> that'll happen often to me... second time already
